name: Space Battle of the Future
description:
Move the with joystick or arrow keys. Shoot with the joystick button or space bar.  Avoid or shoot the enemies. Don't crash into a boss. Face the boss at the end. Kill it and you win!

It is in space so it is future-ish. Not very good with the theme, but it is all I could think of. Wish I had more time to work on it.
